DOC.detailed_description: This single-center study include five visit . The first two visit ( screen familiarization ) allow check eligibility volunteer . In case inclusion , subject assign sequence three experimental condition ( water , sugar artificial sweetener ) , randomize , crossover design . The experimental test divide 5 stage : 1. 90 minute baseline period ( t=0-90 min ) , 2. 30-min mental stress ( MS ; t=90-120 min ) , consist 5-min period Stroop 's color word conflict test alternate 5-min period mental arithmetic test . 3. 30-min MS recovery period ( t=120-150 ) , 4. 3-min cold pressure test ( CPT ) carry , aim immerse one volunteer 's forearm ice water container 3°C , 3 ) 15-min CPT recovery period ( t=120-150 ) . 60 min begin metabolic test , volunteer drink 25 mL every 15 min , 10-sec mouth rinsing , either artificially- sugar-sweetened beverage water ( control ) . Hemodynamic stress response measure repeat blood pressure , heart rate cardiac output . Repeated venous blood sample allow assess metabolic stress response . Each condition ( water , artificial sweetener sugar ) precede 2-day run-in period .
DOC.criteria: Healthy Caucasian Normal Body Mass Index ( 18.5 ≤BMI≤ 25 kg/m2 ) Monophasic oral contraceptive Hypertension ( Blood pressure > 140/90 mmHg ) History actual psychologic/cardiovascular trouble Anemia anamnesis Being Pregnant Weight < 50 kg Blood donation participation another study < 8 week Claustrophobia Consumption sugar/artificallysweetened beverage drink > 5 dL/d Visual disturbance ( daltonism ) Low moderate physical activity ( > 4h/wk ) Smoker narcotic consumption Caffeine ( > 400 mg/d ) and/or alcohol ( > 10g/d ) consumption Medical treatment Weight variation > 3kg last month
